resources.string: There are two methods to capture your smile. Trigger taking photo function by recognizing that most people are smiling or the nearest person is smiling.
This app requires camera and storage access in order to demo the API.
Para ingresar a tu selfie cam, por favor ingresa con tu Huawei ID. Te tomara menos de 1 minuto ingresar a probar esta maravillosa aplicaci√≥n
